author: jbellis
msg: simplify configuration file loading; rename to cassandra.xml

author: gsim
msg: QPID-2511: Altered shutdown sequence in connectors; after connect() has returned there will always now be a shutdown callback made and only at that point is it guaranteed that there will be no further io callbacks. ConnectionImpl consequently waits for this before allowing itself to be deleted.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-4565: Make it possible to run the concurrency test for sequence generators without any tables in order to isolate sequence generator behavior from other concurrency bottlenecks.

author: jbohn
msg: ARIES-284 AriesTrader - clean up mode processing
